program_description.description: Identifies a Mobius capacity by means of an approach using a maximum like quadratic entropy principle, which is equivalent to the minimization of the variance. More precisely, this function determines, if it exists, the minimum variance capacity compatible with a set of linear constraints. The problem is solved using strictly convex quadratic programming.

parameter.name: kAdditivity
parameter.description: Indicates the level of k-additivity of the Mobius capacity (the Mobius transform of subsets whose cardinal is superior to k vanishes).
parameter.code: #kAdditivity: %s cat > kAdditivity.xml <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="xmcdaKappalab.xsl"?> <xmcda:XMCDA xmlns:xmcda="http://www.decision-deck.org/2009/XMCDA-2.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.decision-deck.org/2009/XMCDA-2.0.0 file:/home/pat/Documents/currentResearch/DecisionDeck/svn-DecisionDeck/XMCDA/XMCDA-2.0.0.xsd"><methodParameters> <parameter name="kAdditivity"> <value> <integer>%s</integer> </value> </parameter> </methodParameters> </xmcda:XMCDA> EOF

constraint.description: The value should be a positive integer, less than or equal to the number of criteria.

parameter.name: criteria
parameter.description: A list of criteria. Criteria can be activated or desactivated via the <active> tag.

parameter.name: alternatives
parameter.description: A list of alternatives. Alternatives can be activated or desactivated via the <active> tag.

parameter.name: performanceTable
parameter.description: A performance table. The evaluations should be numeric values, i.e. <real>, <integer> or <rational>.

parameter.name: shapleyPreorder
parameter.description: A valued relation on criteria expressing importance constraints on the critera. A numeric <value> indicates a minimal preference threshold for each <pair>. One <pair> represents an affirmation of the type "the Shapley importance index of criterion g1 is greater than the Shapley importance index of criterion g2 with preference threshold delta".

parameter.name: shapleyInterval
parameter.description: A list of <criterionValue> containing the constraints relative to the quantitative importance of the criteria. Each <criterionValue> contains an an <interval>. Each <criteriaValue> represents an affirmation of the type "the Shapley importance index of criterion g1 lies in the interval [a,b]".

parameter.name: interactionPreorder
parameter.description: A valued relation on pairs of criteria expressing constraints on value of the the Shapley interaction index. A numeric <value> indicates a minimal preference threshold for each <pair> of the relation. One <pair> represents a constraint of the type "the Shapley interaction index of the pair (g1,g2) of criteria is greater than the Shapley interaction index of the pair (g3,g4) of criteria with preference threshold delta".

parameter.name: interactionInterval
parameter.description: A list of <criterionValue> containing the constraints relative to the type and the magnitude of the Shapley interaction index for pairs of criteria. Each <criterionValue> contains an an <interval>. Each <criteriaValue> represents an affirmation of the type "the Shapley interaction index of the pair (g1,g2) of criteria lies in the interval [a,b]".

parameter.name: alternativesPreorder
parameter.description: A valued relation relative to the preorder of the alternatives. A numeric <value> indicates a minimal preference threshold for each <pair> of the relation. One <pair> represents a constraint of the type "alternative a is preferred to alternative b with preference threshold delta".

parameter.name: messages
parameter.description: A list of messages generated by the algorithm.

parameter.name: mobiusCapacity
parameter.description: The Mobius transform of a capacity.

constraint.description: value should be a positive or null integer
